text: Taron is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Fasciolariidae, the spindle snails, the tulip snails and their allies. ==Species== Species within the genus Taron include: * Taron albocostus Ponder, 1968 * Taron dubius (Hutton, 1878) * Taron mouatae Powell, 1940 ==References== ==External links== * Bruce A. Marshall, Molluscan and brachiopod taxa introduced by F. W. Hutton in The New Zealand journal of science; Journal of the Royal Society of New Zealand, Volume 25, Issue 4, 1995 Category:Fasciolariidae
title: Taron (gastropod)
